Key Arguments: Support for the submission made by Catholics for Renewal regarding the legislation.
Opposition to any exemption that would allow the teaching of outdated views on homosexuality on media platforms.
Advocacy for amendments to the bill to require religious bodies to acknowledge modern psychiatric views on homosexuality.
Main Themes: Support for combating misinformation and disinformation.
Advocacy for modern psychiatric understanding of homosexuality.
Opposition to religious exemptions in the context of misinformation.
Notable Quotes: We wish to emphasise the changes in modern psychiatry that no longer classify homosexuality as a clinical disorder requiring treatment.
